channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries receive major fire risk warning
item.description: The U.S Consumer Product Safety Commission claims Rad Power "refused to agree to an acceptable recall." Rad Power says the CPSC's solution would bankrupt the company.

item.title: Sam Altman and Jony Ive AI device is now in its prototype phase and its 'vibe' is defined
item.description: Laurene Powell Jobs just pulled a raft of information out of Sam Altman and Jony Ive on their upcoming AI device.

item.title: Les meilleures piles rechargeables du marché sont en promo à -26 % sur Amazon
item.description: Le problème des piles rechargeables classiques ? Elles se déchargent toutes seules dans le tiroir. Le problème des Eneloop Pro ? Elles coûtent cher. Bonne nouvelle : le deuxième problème est réglé temporairement par Amazon avec une remise de 26 %. Pour le premier, la technologie Ni-MH japonaise s'occupe de tout.

item.title: I'm changing my office setup with these 7 Amazon Haul productivity bargains for Black Friday
item.description: You can equip your office with all manner of super-affordable items from Amazon Haul.

item.title: Nvidia’s ‘I’m Not Enron’ memo has people asking a lot of questions already answered by that memo
item.description: Christ. Fine. So over the weekend, a strange Substack post from what appears to be a CEO of a pet relocation company went very viral. This post — which to be clear, is bullshit — alleges that Nvidia is engaged in “may become the largest accounting fraud in technology history.” That’s a load-bearing “may,” in […]

item.title: I've tested hundreds of laptops, and the only Surface Pro I've ever liked is now on sale for Black Friday at an unbeatable price
item.description: I love the Microsoft Surface Pro 11 more than just about any other 2-in-1 on the market, and it's even better now that it's on sale for Black Friday.

item.title: Tesla FSD software may not be approved by EU regulator after all
item.description: Tesla claimed in a weekend social media post that a Dutch regulator was set to approve its Full Self-Driving mode. It seems the regulator isn't quite in line with Tesla.

item.title: China’s Simulated Attack Shows How It Could Jam Musk’s Starlink Over Taiwan
item.description: To overcome the constellation's evasive nature, China would need a swarm of hundreds of drones, a new study finds.

item.title: Xbox Crocs are real
item.description: Microsoft is loving Crocs at the moment. After releasing Windows XP-themed Crocs earlier this year, the software maker is now putting an Xbox controller on your feet with a new limited edition pair of Crocs. Available on November 25th for $80, the Xbox Crocs mimic the Xbox One X’s controller with fixed buttons and joysticks. […]

item.title: Where Is the Trump Phone?
item.description: Is it located in the same place as the plan to repeal and replace Obamacare?

item.title: This Week’s ‘Pluribus’ Arrives Early, Carol
item.description: Apple TV is dropping episode five, 'Got Milk,' ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday.

item.title: I compared LG’s B5 and C5 OLED TVs – here’s the Black Friday deal I’d choose
item.description: I've had extensive time using both the LG C5 and LG B5 OLED TVs, and have advice on how to know which model is right for you this Black Friday.

item.title: The perfect gamer gift - Best Buy's Black Friday sale includes great deals on Razer peripherals
item.description: Looking for some decent gaming peripherals this Black Friday? Best Buy has some great discounts on Razer products today.

item.title: OpenAI Is Having a Mental Health Crisis
item.description: ChatGPT's mental health team is bleeding talent and facing controversy

item.title: Signal’s secure message backups arrive on iOS
item.description: Signal is launching secure backups on iOS, allowing you to save and restore your messages in case you lose or break your phone. With the free version of the feature, you can store up to 100MB of text messages, along with the past 45 days’ worth of photos, videos, GIFs, and files. There’s also a […]

item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries are a fire risk and shouldn’t be used, CPSC warns
item.description: The US Consumer Protection Safety Commission issued a stark warning about Rad Power Bikes’ e-bike batteries Monday, linking them to dozens of fires and saying they “pose a risk of serious injury and death.” The batteries can “unexpectedly ignite and explode,” especially when water or debris leaks in to cells or the harness, the agency […]

item.title: Hands on with Stickerbox, the AI-powered sticker maker for kids
item.description: Stickerbox turns kids’ ideas into printable stickers, blending AI magic with hands-on coloring for a surprisingly creative, "screen-light" play experience.

item.title: You Shouldn’t Expect a Cheap Steam Machine
item.description: Everything Valve has said paints the Steam Machine as a PC.

item.title: HP Black Friday laptop sales are here: huge discounts on work, creative and AI powered portables
item.description: HP's Black Friday laptop deals are live, giving you the chance to grab a work, home, or AI powered portable for less.

item.title: Anthropic’s new model is its latest frontier in the AI agent battle — but it’s still facing cybersecurity concerns
item.description: The AI labs never sleep — especially the week before Thanksgiving, it seems. Days after Google’s buzzworthy Gemini 3, and OpenAI’s updated agentic coding model, Anthropic has announced Claude Opus 4.5, which it bills as “the best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use,” claiming it has leapfrogged even Gemini 3 in […]

item.title: I’m a trained TV calibrator, and these are the best budget big-screen TVs this Black Friday
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday deals bring these already high-value mini-LED TVs to an even lower price point.

item.title: Feeling Thoughtless This Holiday Season? ChatGPT Can Now Shop for You
item.description: Don't tell your loved ones you let a bot pick their gift.

item.title: 21 Black Friday streaming deals: See free offers on Peacock, Spotify, and Paramount+, plus a record discount on HBO Max
item.description: The best Black Friday streaming deals include free offers on Spotify, Apple TV, and Peacock, plus 75% discounts on HBO Max.

A glass screen protector is one of a few essential accessories that every Switch 2 owner should make, along with a select few others. […]

item.title: Now That Pennywise Has Arrived on ‘It: Welcome to Derry,’ Bob Gray Is Close Behind
item.description: The HBO show's creators talked about what to expect next as the story digs deeper into the origins of Stephen King's villainous clown.

item.title: The best gifts for dads that have everything (but deserve more)
item.description: What do you get the man who says he has everything? It's a tough question - and one you have a limited amount of time to answer, given the holidays are nearly upon us. You could try dropping subtle hints or asking friends and family for suggestions, but they might save their best ideas for […]

item.title: What is the release date for Pluribus episode 5 on Apple TV?
item.description: Pluribus' fifth episode will be released earlier than anticipated – here's when and where you can watch it.

item.title: What ‘Sent from my . . .’ in your emails says about you
item.description: Survey data suggests some coworkers catch certain vibes when you send messages from your mobile device. The average U.S. employee clocks nearly 21 full business days working from their phone each year. That’s according to new research from Adobe Acrobat, who surveyed over 1,000 full-time employees on their habits and opinions around work phone etiquette. ...

item.title: Amazon Leo is ready for testing and aimed squarely at Starlink’s dominance
item.description: Amazon unveiled its production-ready Ultra antenna and began shipping units to early partners as it works toward a commercial rollout. The Bezos vs. Musk battle for satellite internet service is heating up

item.title: This is the best Black Friday Windows laptop deal I've found – score the Dell 15 for just $250
item.description: The Dell 15 laptop is already one of the best values you're going to find anywhere, but this offer from Dell makes it an unbeatable deal.

item.title: The Steam Deck LCD is 20 percent off for Black Friday
item.description: All eyes have been on Valve’s new hardware coming out in 2026, including the Steam Frame headset, the Steam Machine console, and the Steam Controller. But for those who are shopping for someone who wants a fantastic gaming handheld for the holidays, the Steam Deck LCD with 256GB of storage is $319.20 — 20 percent […]
